Text.text: Which of these is NOT a service of the Center for Undergraduate Research?
International research programs
Incorrect: information about international research programs is offered at the Center for Undergraduate Research!
Assistance with research papers
Correct. The Center for Undergraduate Research is designed to help you get involved in ongoing research projects with faculty, NOT to assist you with research papers for a class.
Senior thesis
Incorrect: senior thesis opportunities ARE offered at the Center for Undergraduate Research!
Summer research projects
Incorrect: summer research projects ARE offered at the Center for Undergraduate Research!
Which of these statements about UD study abroad is NOT true?
You may only apply to programs within your major
Correct! You may be eligible for many programs offered outside of your major.
You may study abroad as many times as you choose
Incorrect: there is no limit to the number of times you study abroad, but many students find it too expensive to study abroad every year.
Scholarships are available
Incorrect: scholarships are available for all study abroad trips!
You can study abroad for an entire semester
Incorrect: there are several study abroad trips that last an entire semester.
Identify the incorrect statement about the Service Learning Scholars program.
Students spend the majority of their time in academic reading, discussion, and reflection
Correct: this statement is false. Students spend only a quarter of their time in academic reading, discussion, and reflection. The majority of the studentsâ€™ time is spent working in the community.
Projects may be conducted in any major
Incorrect: Service Learning projects CAN be conducted in any major.
A spending stipend and housing stipend are provided
Incorrect: a spending stipend and housing stipend ARE provided to students during Service Learning Projects.
Projects are conducted in the Delaware community area only
Incorrect: it is true that projects are only conducted in the Delaware community area.
Which of the following typically takes place ON campus?
Study abroad programs
Incorrect: study abroad programs take place off campus, typically outside of the United States.
Service Learning Program projects
Incorrect: Service Learning projects take place in the Delaware community, but not necessarily on campus.
All of the above
Incorrect: two of these options do not typically take place on campus.
UD Undergraduate Research Program projects
Correct! Projects through the UD Undergraduate Research Program typically take place in one of the many laboratories on campus.
How far before a study abroad trip starts might the application be due?
2 years
Incorrect: study abroad trips are not planned this far ahead of time.
9 months
Correct! Study abroad applications may be due as early as 9 months before a trip begins, so make sure to start looking at trips ahead of time.
3 weeks
Incorrect: study abroad applications are never due that close to the start of the trip.
1 day
Incorrect: study abroad applications are never due that close to the start of the trip.
Which of these can be found on the website for the Center of Undergraduate Research?
Information about programs elsewhere in the country and all over the world
Incorrect: this information CAN be found on the website for the Center of Undergraduate Research.
Information on doing a Senior Thesis
Incorrect: this information CAN be found on the website for the Center of Undergraduate Research.
Information on the Summer Scholars Program
Incorrect: this information CAN be found on the website for the Center of Undergraduate Research.
All of the above
Correct! All of this information can be found on the website for the Center of Undergraduate Research.
